metadata.Title: CVE-2021-21841 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: An exploitable integer overflow vulnerability exists within the MPEG-4decoding functionality of the GPAC Project on Advanced Content libraryv1.0.1. A specially crafted MPEG-4 input when reading an atom using the'sbgp' FOURCC code can cause an integer overflow due to uncheckedarithmetic resulting in a heap-based buffer overflow that causes memorycorruption. An attacker can convince a user to open a video to trigger thisvulnerability.

criterions.comment: gpac package in trusty/esm is affected and may need fixing.
